about_the_game:
The Spoilerific Unlock Pack includes:

Lights, Camera, Action!:
The following PVS features will be unlocked:
- Songs
- Camera Movement
- Dance Moves
- Concert Stages
- Ad Lib Staging
*In order to use these features, the PVS will need to be unlocked.

Full Gallery Unlocked:
All event images will be added to the Gallery
*In order to access this area, the game must have progressed to Episode 1.

Character Appreciation:
The Character Database will be unlocked! Access through Menu > Database
*In order to access this area, the game must have progressed to Episode 1.
detailed_description:
The Spoilerific Unlock Pack includes:

Lights, Camera, Action!:
The following PVS features will be unlocked:
- Songs
- Camera Movement
- Dance Moves

*In order to use these features, the PVS will need to be unlocked.

Full Gallery Unlocked:
All event images will be added to the Gallery
*In order to access this area, the game must have progressed to Episode 1.

Character Appreciation:
The Character Database will be unlocked! Access through Menu > Database
*In order to access this area, the game must have progressed to Episode 1.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.4GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: The Spoilerific Unlock Pack includes: Lights, Camera, Action!, Full Gallery Unlocked, Character Appreciation
